original_text: And they are informed of thee, that thou teachest all the Jews which are among the Gentiles to forsake Moses, saying that they ought not to circumcise their children, neither to walk after the customs.
korean_text: 네가 이방에 있는 모든 유대인을 가르치되 모세를 배반하고 아들들에게 할례를 행하지 말고 또 관습을 지키지 말라 한다 함을 그들이 들었도다

sentences.original_text: And they are informed of thee
that thou teachest all the Jews
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 모든 유대인들을 가르치고 있다는 것을

sentences.original_text: saying that they ought not to circumcise their children
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 자식들을 할례받지 말아야 한다고 말하며

sentences.original_text: neither to walk after the customs
